h3cPortal.name: h3cPortal
h3cPortal.contactinfo: Platform Team Hangzhou H3C Tech. Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
h3cPortal.description: The MIB module is used for managing portal.

h3cPortalMaxUserNumber.name: h3cPortalMaxUserNumber
h3cPortalMaxUserNumber.description: Specify the maximum number of online users, the value to be set should meet the following two conditions: 1. Less than or equal to h3cPortalUserNumberUpperLimit. 2. Greater than or equal to one. The default value is equal to h3cPortalUserNumberUpperLimit.

h3cPortalCurrentUserNumber.name: h3cPortalCurrentUserNumber
h3cPortalCurrentUserNumber.description: The current number of users connecting to the portal.

h3cPortalStatus.name: h3cPortalStatus
h3cPortalStatus.description: It indicates the portal status. enabled: Portal is enabled on one or more interfaces. disabled: Portal is not enabled on any interface.

h3cPortalNasId.name: h3cPortalNasId
h3cPortalNasId.description: The nas id of this device.

h3cPortalServerTable.name: h3cPortalServerTable
h3cPortalServerTable.description: This table defines the name and URL of portal server. It can not be created and destroyed by MIB.

h3cPortalServerEntry.name: h3cPortalServerEntry
h3cPortalServerEntry.description: There is a row in this table for each name and URL of portal server. It is indexed using the object h3cPortalServerName.

h3cPortalServerName.name: h3cPortalServerName
h3cPortalServerName.description: It is the index of the table of h3cPortalServerTable, it shows the name of the portal server.

h3cPortalServerUrl.name: h3cPortalServerUrl
h3cPortalServerUrl.description: It shows the uniform resource locator to the portal server. Users which have not logon to portal will be redirected to the portal server according to h3cPortalServerUrl. The value is consisted of protocol, IP address and relative path. For example: HTTP://10.1.1.1/portal It is not configurable when the portal server has been enabled.

h3cPortalServerPort.name: h3cPortalServerPort
h3cPortalServerPort.description: It shows the UDP port of the portal server. The port will be used when client sends packets to portal server. Default value is 50100. It is not configurable when the portal server has been enabled.

h3cPortalIfInfoTable.name: h3cPortalIfInfoTable
h3cPortalIfInfoTable.description: This table describes the portal information on some interface.

h3cPortalIfInfoEntry.name: h3cPortalIfInfoEntry
h3cPortalIfInfoEntry.description: There is a row in this table for a interface on which portal has been enabled. It is indexed using the object ifIndex.

h3cPortalAuthReqNumber.name: h3cPortalAuthReqNumber
h3cPortalAuthReqNumber.description: It shows the number of authentication request messages which are sent by portal module to AAA module.

h3cPortalAuthSuccNumber.name: h3cPortalAuthSuccNumber
h3cPortalAuthSuccNumber.description: It shows the number of authentication success response messages which are sent by AAA module to portal module.

h3cPortalAuthFailNumber.name: h3cPortalAuthFailNumber
h3cPortalAuthFailNumber.description: It shows the number of authentication failure response messages which are sent by AAA module to portal module.

h3cPortalIfServerTable.name: h3cPortalIfServerTable
h3cPortalIfServerTable.description: This table describes the portal information on some interface.

h3cPortalIfServerEntry.name: h3cPortalIfServerEntry
h3cPortalIfServerEntry.description: There is a row in this table for a interface on which portal has been enabled. It is indexed using the object ifIndex.

h3cPortalIfServerIndex.name: h3cPortalIfServerIndex
h3cPortalIfServerIndex.description: It is the index of the table of h3cIfPtServerTable, it shows the index of the portal server.

h3cPortalIfServerUrl.name: h3cPortalIfServerUrl
h3cPortalIfServerUrl.description: It shows the uniform resource locator to the portal server. Users which have not logon to portal will be redirected to the portal server according to h3cPortalServerIfUrl. The value is consisted of protocol, IP address and relative path. For example: HTTP://10.1.1.1/portal It is not configurable when the portal server has been enabled.

h3cPortalIfServerRowStatus.name: h3cPortalIfServerRowStatus
h3cPortalIfServerRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which support active status and CreateAndGo, Destroy operation. To create a new row, portal server must be specified. To destroy an existent row, the portal server MUST NOT be referred by interface.

h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDTable.name: h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDTable
h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDTable.description: This table describes the interface on which portal has been enabled, the Vlan that the interface belongs to and the NAS ID to which the Vlan is bound.

h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDEntry.name: h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDEntry
h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDEntry.description: There is a row in this table for a interface on which portal has been enabled, the Vlan that the interface belongs to and the NAS ID to which the Vlan is bound. It is indexed using the object ifIndex and Vlan that the interface belongs to.

h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDIfIndex.name: h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDIfIndex
h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDIfIndex.description: It is the index of the table of h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDTable, it shows the interface on which portal has been enabled.

h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDVlanID.name: h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDVlanID
h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDVlanID.description: It is the index of the table of h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDTable, it shows the Vlan that the interface belongs to.

h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDNasID.name: h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDNasID
h3cPortalIfVlanNasIDNasID.description: It is the NAS ID to which the Vlan is bound to.

h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleTable.name: h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleTable
h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleTable.description: This table describes SSID portal-free rule(s) allows specified users to access specified external websites without portal authentication.

h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleEntry.name: h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleEntry
h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleEntry.description: There is a row in this table for SSID portal-free rule. It is indexed using the object Index.

h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleIndex.name: h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleIndex
h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleIndex.description: It is the index of the table of h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleTable, it shows the index of the SSID portal-free rule.

h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleSrcSSID.name: h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleSrcSSID
h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleSrcSSID.description: The SSID match against the packet's source SSID.

h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleRowStatus.name: h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleRowStatus
h3cPortalSSIDFreeRuleRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which support active status and CreateAndGo, Destroy operation.

h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvTable.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvTable
h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvTable.description: This table describes the configration of MAC Trigger Portal server.

h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvEntry.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvEntry
h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvEntry.description: There is a row in the table for MAC Trigger Portal server. It is indexed using the object Index.

h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvIndex.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvIndex
h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvIndex.description: It is the index of the table of h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvTable, it shows the index of the MAC Trigger Portal server.

h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvIPAddrType.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvIPAddrType
h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvIPAddrType.description: The type of MAC Trigger Portal server IP address. While other types of addresses are defined in the InetAddressType textual convention, and DNS names, a classifier can only look at packets on the wire.

h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvIP.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvIP
h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvIP.description: It shows the IP address of MAC Trigger Portal server.

h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvPort.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvPort
h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvPort.description: It shows the UDP port of MAC Trigger Portal server. The port will be used when client sends packets to MAC Trigger Portal server. Default value is 50100.

h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvRowStatus.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvRowStatus
h3cPortalMacTriggerSrvRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which support active status and CreateAndGo, Destroy operation.

h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfTable.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfTable
h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfTable.description: This table describes the configration of Portal MAC Trigger on interface.

h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfEntry.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfEntry
h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfEntry.description: There is a row in the table for Portal MAC Trigger configuration on interface. It is indexed using the object Index.

h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfIfIndex.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfIfIndex
h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfIfIndex.description: It is the interface index and the index of h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfTable.

h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfDetctFlowPeriod.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfDetctFlowPeriod
h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfDetctFlowPeriod.description: It shows the period of detecting the user flow when MAC Trigger and Portal is enabled. The unit is second.

h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfThresholdFlow.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfThresholdFlow
h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfThresholdFlow.description: It shows the threshold flow of the user to triggering authentication when MAC Trigger and Portal is enabled. The unit is byte.

h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfRowStatus.name: h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfRowStatus
h3cPortalMacTriggerOnIfRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which support active status and CreateAndGo, Destroy operation.

h3cPortalFreeRuleTable.name: h3cPortalFreeRuleTable
h3cPortalFreeRuleTable.description: This table describes portal-free rule(s) allows specified users to access specified external websites without portal authentication.

h3cPortalFreeRuleEntry.name: h3cPortalFreeRuleEntry
h3cPortalFreeRuleEntry.description: There is a row in this table for portal-free rule. It is indexed using the object Index.

h3cPortalFreeRuleIndex.name: h3cPortalFreeRuleIndex
h3cPortalFreeRuleIndex.description: It is the index of the table of h3cPortalFreeRuleTable, it shows the index of the portal-free rule.

h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcMac.name: h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcMac
h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcMac.description: The MAC address to match against the packet's source MAC address.

h3cPortalFreeRuleAddrType.name: h3cPortalFreeRuleAddrType
h3cPortalFreeRuleAddrType.description: The type of IP address used by this classifier entry. While other types of addresses are defined in the InetAddressType textual convention, and DNS names, a classifier can only look at packets on the wire.

h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcAddr.name: h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcAddr
h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcAddr.description: The IP address to match against the packet's source IP address. This may be a DNS name or an IPv4 or IPv6 prefix. h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcPrefix indicates the number of bits that are relevant.

h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcPrefix.name: h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcPrefix
h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcPrefix.description: The length of the CIDR Prefix carried in h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcAddr. In IPv4 addresses, a length of 0 indicates a match of any address; a length of 32 indicates a match of a single host address, and a length between 0 and 32 indicates the use of a CIDR Prefix. IPv6 is similar, except that prefix lengths range from 0..128.

h3cPortalFreeRuleDstAddr.name: h3cPortalFreeRuleDstAddr
h3cPortalFreeRuleDstAddr.description: The IP address to match against the packet's destination IP address. This may be a DNS name or an IPv4 or IPv6 prefix. h3cPortalFreeRuleDstPrefix indicates the number of bits that are relevant.

h3cPortalFreeRuleDstPrefix.name: h3cPortalFreeRuleDstPrefix
h3cPortalFreeRuleDstPrefix.description: The length of the CIDR Prefix carried in h3cPortalFreeRuleDstAddr. In IPv4 addresses, a length of 0 indicates a match of any address; a length of 32 indicates a match of a single host address, and a length between 0 and 32 indicates the use of a CIDR Prefix. IPv6 is similar, except that prefix lengths range from 0..128.

h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcPort.name: h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcPort
h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcPort.description: The source port allows users to access.

h3cPortalFreeRuleDstPort.name: h3cPortalFreeRuleDstPort
h3cPortalFreeRuleDstPort.description: The destination port allows users to access.

h3cPortalFreeRuleRowStatus.name: h3cPortalFreeRuleRowStatus
h3cPortalFreeRuleRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which support active status and CreateAndGo, Destroy operation.

h3cPortalForbiddenRuleTable.name: h3cPortalForbiddenRuleTable
h3cPortalForbiddenRuleTable.description: This table describes a portal-forbidden rule does not allow specified users to access specified external websites.

h3cPortalForbiddenRuleEntry.name: h3cPortalForbiddenRuleEntry
h3cPortalForbiddenRuleEntry.description: There is a row in this table for portal-forbidden rule. It is indexed using the object Index.

h3cPortalForbiddenRuleIndex.name: h3cPortalForbiddenRuleIndex
h3cPortalForbiddenRuleIndex.description: It is the index of the table of h3cPortalForbiddenRuleTable, it shows the index of the portal-forbidden rule.

h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcMac.name: h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcMac
h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcMac.description: The MAC address to match against the packet's source MAC address.

h3cPortalForbiddenRuleAddrType.name: h3cPortalForbiddenRuleAddrType
h3cPortalForbiddenRuleAddrType.description: The type of IP address used by this classifier entry. While other types of addresses are defined in the InetAddressType textual convention, and DNS names, a classifier can only look at packets on the wire.

h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcAddr.name: h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcAddr
h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcAddr.description: The IP address to match against the packet's source IP address. This may be a DNS name or an IPv4 or IPv6 prefix. h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcPrefix indicates the number of bits that are relevant.

h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcPrefix.name: h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcPrefix
h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcPrefix.description: The length of the CIDR Prefix carried in h3cPortalFreeRuleSrcAddr. In IPv4 addresses, a length of 0 indicates a match of any address; a length of 32 indicates a match of a single host address, and a length between 0 and 32 indicates the use of a CIDR Prefix. IPv6 is similar, except that prefix lengths range from 0..128.

h3cPortalForbiddenRuleDstAddr.name: h3cPortalForbiddenRuleDstAddr
h3cPortalForbiddenRuleDstAddr.description: The IP address to match against the packet's destination IP address. This may be a DNS name or an IPv4 or IPv6 prefix. h3cPortalForbiddenRuleDstPrefix indicates the number of bits that are relevant.

h3cPortalForbiddenRuleDstPrefix.name: h3cPortalForbiddenRuleDstPrefix
h3cPortalForbiddenRuleDstPrefix.description: The length of the CIDR Prefix carried in h3cPortalFreeRuleDstAddr. In IPv4 addresses, a length of 0 indicates a match of any address; a length of 32 indicates a match of a single host address, and a length between 0 and 32 indicates the use of a CIDR Prefix. IPv6 is similar, except that prefix lengths range from 0..128.

h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcPort.name: h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcPort
h3cPortalForbiddenRuleSrcPort.description: The source port does not allow users to access.

h3cPortalForbiddenRuleDstPort.name: h3cPortalForbiddenRuleDstPort
h3cPortalForbiddenRuleDstPort.description: The destination port does not allow users to access.

h3cPortalForbiddenRuleRowStatus.name: h3cPortalForbiddenRuleRowStatus
h3cPortalForbiddenRuleRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which support active status and CreateAndGo, Destroy operation.

h3cPortalServerLost.name: h3cPortalServerLost
h3cPortalServerLost.description: This trap is generated when the device finds that the portal server is unreachable, the portal server's name is h3cPortalServerName, and the portal server has been enabled.

h3cPortalServerGet.name: h3cPortalServerGet
h3cPortalServerGet.description: This trap is generated when the device finds that the state of portal server changes from unreachable state to reachable, the portal server's name is h3cPortalServerName, and the portal server has been enabled.

h3cPortalStatAuthReq.name: h3cPortalStatAuthReq
h3cPortalStatAuthReq.description: It shows the total number of portal authentication requests from the portal server.

h3cPortalStatAckLogout.name: h3cPortalStatAckLogout
h3cPortalStatAckLogout.description: It shows the number of logout requests from the portal server.

h3cPortalStatNotifyLogout.name: h3cPortalStatNotifyLogout
h3cPortalStatNotifyLogout.description: It shows the number of logout requests from the access device.

h3cPortalStatChallengeTimeout.name: h3cPortalStatChallengeTimeout
h3cPortalStatChallengeTimeout.description: It shows the number of challenge from the portal server without response.

h3cPortalStatChallengeBusy.name: h3cPortalStatChallengeBusy
h3cPortalStatChallengeBusy.description: It shows the number of device-busy responses for challenges from the portal server.

h3cPortalStatChallengeFail.name: h3cPortalStatChallengeFail
h3cPortalStatChallengeFail.description: It shows the number of challenges from the portal server with failure response.

h3cPortalStatAuthTimeout.name: h3cPortalStatAuthTimeout
h3cPortalStatAuthTimeout.description: It shows the number of authentication requests from the portal server without responses.

h3cPortalStatAuthFail.name: h3cPortalStatAuthFail
h3cPortalStatAuthFail.description: It shows the number of authentication requests from the portal server with failure responses.

h3cPortalStatPwdError.name: h3cPortalStatPwdError
h3cPortalStatPwdError.description: It shows the number of password errors.

h3cPortalStatAuthBusy.name: h3cPortalStatAuthBusy
h3cPortalStatAuthBusy.description: It shows the number of device-busy responses to authentication requests from the portal server.

h3cPortalStatAuthDisordered.name: h3cPortalStatAuthDisordered
h3cPortalStatAuthDisordered.description: It shows the number of disordered authentication packets from the portal server.

h3cPortalStatAuthUnknownError.name: h3cPortalStatAuthUnknownError
h3cPortalStatAuthUnknownError.description: It shows the number of unknown errors.

h3cPortalStatAuthResp.name: h3cPortalStatAuthResp
h3cPortalStatAuthResp.description: It shows the number of authentication response messages which are sent by AC to portal server.

h3cPortalStatChallengeReq.name: h3cPortalStatChallengeReq
h3cPortalStatChallengeReq.description: It shows the number of challenge request messages which are sent by portal server to AC.

h3cPortalStatChallengeResp.name: h3cPortalStatChallengeResp
h3cPortalStatChallengeResp.description: It shows the number of challenge response messages which are sent by AC to portal server.

h3cPortalPktStaReqAuthNum.name: h3cPortalPktStaReqAuthNum
h3cPortalPktStaReqAuthNum.description: It shows the total number of portal authentication requests from the portal server.

h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthSuccess.name: h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthSuccess
h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthSuccess.description: It shows the total number of the response to REQ-AUTH packet of portal server including error code 0 in the packet, that is authentication success.

h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthReject.name: h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthReject
h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthReject.description: It shows the total number of the response to REQ-AUTH packet of portal server including error code 1 in the packet, that is rejected by server.

h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthEstablish.name: h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthEstablish
h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthEstablish.description: It shows the total number of the response to REQ-AUTH packet of portal server including error code 2 in the packet, that is the link is already established.

h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthBusy.name: h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthBusy
h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthBusy.description: It shows the total number of the response to REQ-AUTH packet of portal server including error code 3 in the packet, that is the system is busy.

h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthAuthFail.name: h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthAuthFail
h3cPortalPktStaAckAuthAuthFail.description: It shows the total number of the response to REQ-AUTH packet of portal server including error code 4 in the packet, that is authentication fail.

h3cPortalPktStaReqChallengeNum.name: h3cPortalPktStaReqChallengeNum
h3cPortalPktStaReqChallengeNum.description: It shows the total number of portal challenge requests from the portal server.

h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeSuccess.name: h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeSuccess
h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeSuccess.description: It shows the total number of the response to challenge packet of portal server including error code 0 in the packet, that is challenge is success.

h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeReject.name: h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeReject
h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeReject.description: It shows the total number of the response to challenge packet of portal server including error code 1 in the packet, that is challenge is rejected by server.

h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeEstablish.name: h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeEstablish
h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeEstablish.description: It shows the total number of the response to challenge packet of portal server including error code 2 in the packet, that is the link is alreadys established.

h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeBusy.name: h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeBusy
h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeBusy.description: It shows the total number of the response to challenge packet of portal server including error code 3 in the packet, that is the system is busy.

h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeAuthFail.name: h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeAuthFail
h3cPortalPktStaAckChallengeAuthFail.description: It shows the total number of the response to challenge packet of portal server including error code 4 in the packet, that is authentication fail.
